answers.answer: I think it's anxiety.  I highly doubt it is from your cold.  I don't know and I don't think it could be some sort of reaction to the Robitussin.Try some warm milk or Chamomile tea or a warm bath to help you relax.  Maybe listen to soothing music or go to the gym and work it out.  Sometimes that works for me when I feel restless.  I get that way sometimes when I'm stressed out and have deadlines to meet at work.Hope you feel better.

U are definitely on my prayer's list.Please stay strong my friendI've been thru what u've been thruI feel ur pain.. i know it sucksbut think this : U'd rather have anxiety than having diabetes/HIV right? THose diseases arent curable.. but this disorder is and very easy to be cured!stay strong and god bless!

question: Please someone help me....Last night I couldn't fall asleep and I felt a restlessness throughout my entire body...like restless leg syndrome but throughout my whole body. It's been going on for the whole day today, and has never let up!!! i have a cold right now, but I'm currently not on any med's (except for the robitussin i took) Anyways, I suffer from severe anxiety and OCD...is this a symptom of anxiety or from my cold? or from what??? I don't know but it's driving me NUTS!!! Can someone please help...
title: PLEASE PLEASE HELP
